result.eng: I left school full of hopes.

result.eng: In fact, this republic did not receive much international recognition.

result.eng: He has a lot of money in the bank.

result.eng: This man has a house, a car and a lot of money.

result.eng: For many reasons, this country is divided into two states.

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
